# limel-example-info-tile-styling



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

How to style the Info tile

The component offers different CSS variables for styling
the color of the text, background, and it's icon; as well as
radius of it's rounded corners, and colors of the notification badge
and its text.

## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [limel-info-tile](..)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  limel-example-info-tile-styling --> limel-info-tile
  limel-info-tile --> limel-icon
  limel-info-tile --> limel-circular-progress
  limel-info-tile --> limel-badge
  limel-info-tile --> limel-linear-progress
  limel-info-tile --> limel-3d-hover-effect-glow
  style limel-example-info-tile-styling fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
